name: Beat The Drop
description:
Beat The Drop is a hypercasual puzzle game where the player has to progress around a grid of floor tiles which get destroyed, one by one after moving away from that tile. Swipe your way around the board and clear all of the tiles in any order without getting trapped or dying.

Originally built for a mobile-based university class, this project has been released on the Google Play store to evidence my skills for mobile development work as part of my portfolio of work.
